Text:
This is the most hilarious Holocaust movie ever made! 

I Love the scene where the evil Nazi's dump the old man out of his wheelchair over the balcony from the fifth floor of the apartment building. Then an officer drops a Jew attempting to escape by climbing a wall with a luger from 300 meters, then as the evil Nazi's drive away, they run over every dead Jew laying in the street.

It almost makes Ilsa - She Wolf of the SS look like a PBS documentary.
Bilderbooger - That's a very sad comment.
